alert.note: Alert for Crittenden (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:22PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Crittenden and northwestern Shelby Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 322 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sunset, or near Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, West Memphis, Marion, Millington, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Memphis, Jericho, Frayser, Mound City, Griffin Corner, Gammon, Woodstock, St Clair, Briark, Locke, Sloanville, Elmore Park, Raleigh, Gilestown and Spring Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
